main event: A civilian reported an unidentified object 30 miles west of Lovelock, Nevada on 3rd December 1947.
interesting points: The object was observed at 1225 PST and was at an altitude of 1200' to 13000'.
The sighting lasted for 10-15 seconds and was reported during an automobile observation.
No sound or maneuvers were reported for the unidentified object.
No photographs or sketches were included in the report.
The ATIC Form 329 indicates that the incident was unclassified.
